attributes.action: British army to deal with rioters
attributes.additional_details: It is clear that the rioters aren't intimidated by the police and so go on looting and rioting. With the army working with the police, there will be additional manpower and a much more visible and menacing presence to deter any more of this uncivilized behaviour.

rejection.details:
Due to an administrative error, this e-petition was accepted onto the site by a department other than that responsible for the issue raised.

Please accept our apologies for this error.  You may wish to consider resubmitting your e-petition.
